about_the_game:
He Jia and Han Hui, Li Qiucheng and He Dai, He Ren and Eryue Lan... Different people encountered with their thoughts conveyed. In this autumn day, shall they lost again in sweet osmanthus's fragrance?
Episode 2, now published. It's still follow the storyline of Shan Gui and Bai Qu and displayed in a comic book style. Please enjoy the astonishing autumn scenery of Nanjing with those lovely girls.

Key Features

  • AVG in manga-style
  • Very attractive BGM
  • With only one end
  • A relax and gentle story

Character Voice

  • Han Hui - Luttefair
  • He Jia - Yinshuijing
  • He Dai - Linglixin
  • Li Qiucheng - Zuoye Yangguang
  • Floral Goddess - Xiange
  • Rivulet Nymph - Zisu Jiuyue
  • He Jue - muriko
  • Xia Chuhe - Zisu Jiuyue
  • Ye Siyan - Linglixin
  • He Ren - Cotton Candy
  • Eryue Lan - Xinyue Bingbing

Notice: The chapter selection box only pops up when launched through the Steam Library.
detailed_description:
Continuity Recommendations

Considering the continuity of the story, we do not recommend a separate purchase for players who have not cleared Shan Gui and Bai Qu.

fullgame.name: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / 18.04
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Shan Gui II Episode 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) / 10
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
